STRING: 「I don't wanna!」

LABEL: 0x1C8
STRING: The color of the sea was that of hydrangeas.

LABEL: 0x22F
STRING: flashed across my left and right field of vision in sequence.

STRING: 「I'll become a scientist.」

LABEL: 0x2B4

LABEL: 0x2EF
STRING: A question directed toward a "dream" that was repeated over and over again.

STRING: 「I meant『Chinese characters』!」

LABEL: 0x9FF
STRING: Rumi-chan pleaded with lovely pronunciation.

LABEL: 0xA2B

STRING: ...In that case,

STRING: 「No―the one that leads all things right.」

STRING: 「How about the <Isle of Wind>?」

LABEL: 0xEAE
STRING: 「I'm not asking for a name. ...Well, not bad, though. The <Isle of Wind>, huh? I'll make the suggestion.」

LABEL: 0xF1B
STRING: My father's study.

LABEL: 0xF33
STRING: Lying face-up on the cool floor, I felt the faint vibrations of life, close and far away, on my back.

LABEL: 0xFAF
STRING: In other words, cool『is God』.

LABEL: 0xFDA
STRING: What would a newborn Australopithecus think if I told it that the light reflected in its meaningless eyes

LABEL: 0x1033
STRING: was an electric imitation of the sun floating in a wooden sky?

LABEL: 0x109C
STRING: 「Do we really have to stick to wind power, is what I'm thinking.

LABEL: 0x10F0
STRING: I get that they're "good job" on the outside, but in terms of energy efficiency, they're more like "goddamn."」

STRING: 「What in the world is influencing you this time...?

LABEL: 0x1187
STRING: ――You're thinking of installing a wave power generation float, aren't you? I was considering that as well.

STRING: However, it's difficult to secure a row of wind turbines in the sea where wave power can be used to generate electricity.」

LABEL: 0x1247
STRING: 「No, that's naive. There are plenty of examples of wave and wind power. We're aiming for three.」

LABEL: 0x12AD
STRING: Fleming's left hand was held out as I spoke―the FBI.

LABEL: 0x12EF
STRING: Expressions like "oh really" or "mm-hmm" might sound meaningless,

LABEL: 0x133B
STRING: but for him, they were a way to show that he was paying attention and encouraging me to keep talking.

LABEL: 0x1397
STRING: 「The Holy Trinity, the three primary colors, the Three Sacred Treasures, three court ladies, a parent and child meeting...

LABEL: 0x13D9
STRING: Since ancient times, the number three has represented a concept of perfection.

LABEL: 0x141F
STRING: If I were to add one more thing to the <Isle of Wind>――

LABEL: 0x145C
STRING: it'd be%Nartificial photosynthesis.」

LABEL: 0x147D
STRING: In other words, it was an idea of an "economic animal" that aimed to harness the power of the wind and waves, as well as the power of the sun, to extract energy,

LABEL: 0x14DF
STRING: expressed by blowing soap bubbles toward the sky.

LABEL: 0x154C
STRING: It evoked an image of something clinging to the heavens.

LABEL: 0x15F9
STRING: 「..Mm-hmm, yeah. ――That's a great idea. Way to go, Tokiwa!」

LABEL: 0x1642
STRING: He nodded his head repeatedly and called my name with genuine joy and pride.

STRING: At that moment, as I bent my knees to create a bridge of happiness...

LABEL: 0x16E9
STRING: 「That's right! The <Isle of Wind> Project has only just begun recruiting members. Why don't you join us?」

LABEL: 0x17C7
STRING: 「Eeh? It's not fair only Onee-chan gets to do that.」

STRING: Rumi-chan raised her voice in protest and appeared in my field of vision.

STRING: Although it was just an image, it would be a pain to return the ceiling to its original state,

LABEL: 0x18A0
STRING: so I quickly closed my eyes.

LABEL: 0x18CB
STRING: 「Didn't you want to become a poet, Rumi-chan?」

LABEL: 0x1902
STRING: 「Ah! Keep it a secret from Dad...

LABEL: 0x192B
STRING: I never said that! Aah!」

LABEL: 0x1958
STRING: 「Poetry is about unraveling the world. The goal is no different from physics, you know?」

LABEL: 0x19AF
STRING: 「Oh! Huh? Oh! I'll do my best!」

LABEL: 0x19E6
STRING: Even with my eyes closed, or perhaps because they were closed,

LABEL: 0x1A1E
STRING: I was able to appreciate Rumi-chan's bewilderment in three-dimensional space from all angles.

LABEL: 0x1A76
STRING: 「Actually, just between you and me, I've decided on my next post.

LABEL: 0x1AAE
STRING: I don't think I'll be able to spend much time on this project, so I've been looking for someone to fill in.

LABEL: 0x1B04
STRING: The board of directors. What do you think? Isn't that amazing?」

LABEL: 0x1B43
STRING: 「It makes you seem old. Our youthful father isn't suited for any post beyond that of a part-time leader.」

LABEL: 0x1BB4
STRING: 「Where are you picking up all these words?

LABEL: 0x1BEE
STRING: Have I raised you the wrong way?」

LABEL: 0x1C22
STRING: 「That can't be. Just look at us beautiful sisters. I don't remember being raised the wrong way.」

LABEL: 0x1C85
STRING: 「Me neither!」

LABEL: 0x1CA6
STRING: I could feel the warmth of my body spreading out onto the floor from my back.

LABEL: 0x1CE4
STRING: As a localized source of heat, I knew that eventually it would spread through the entire room.

LABEL: 0x1D35
STRING: Absorbing and being absorbed in an irreversible reaction. A serpent ring was formed where the starting and ending points overlapped.

LABEL: 0x1D98
STRING: When I lifted my eyelids, my father's face was right in front of me.

LABEL: 0x1DD6
STRING: Hair trimmed like a job hunter, collar straightened.

LABEL: 0x1E19
STRING: His gentle smile looked childish but also somehow philosophical――

LABEL: 0x1E65
STRING: I would carve it into my retinas as an ideal I should aim for.

LABEL: 0x1EAE
STRING: 「I know it's sudden, but as a board member, I'll nominate you for the project.

LABEL: 0x1EF6
STRING: But... it doesn't matter if you're my daughter or that you're young.

LABEL: 0x1F40
STRING: You'll have to pass the employment exam head-on.」

LABEL: 0x1F71
STRING: 「Piece of cake.」

LABEL: 0x1F8C
STRING: I put my hand on my chest and felt it.

LABEL: 0x1FC0
STRING: This heartbeat that was my inner moral law――

LABEL: 0x20CE
STRING: The guidance of my swaying vision would change focus in just a few short months.

LABEL: 0x211C
STRING: I looked up at the ceiling, which was now hard concrete.

LABEL: 0x2152
STRING: This was where I lived now.

LABEL: 0x2185
STRING: I wondered how long it had been since I got involved with the ROMLES organization.

LABEL: 0x21DA
STRING: The private room I was given was underground, and although there was no inconvenience whatsoever, it was still underground.

LABEL: 0x2248
STRING: Just the tip of human activity slowly expanding their range of application of terrestrial law.

LABEL: 0x228F
STRING: Here, the flow of time had no meaning. It was only measured as a reference point.

LABEL: 0x22EC
STRING: And above all, I couldn't go home until the project was over.

LABEL: 0x233C
STRING: 「I heard she's the daughter of that Saihouji-san.」

LABEL: 0x236F
STRING: 「Really? He doesn't look like he'd have a child that old.」

LABEL: 0x23BA
STRING: All the underground people seemed to know my father.

LABEL: 0x240D
STRING: Whenever they looked at me, they always thought of my father first.

LABEL: 0x244A
STRING: It was less like a veil and more like ether that covered the research facility

LABEL: 0x2494
STRING: and wouldn't allow one to escape from it.

LABEL: 0x24C8
STRING: The father『is great』, therefore, the daughter『is』――

LABEL: 0x2501
STRING: Sadly, before they were disciples of science, they were simply human beings.

LABEL: 0x2544
STRING: 「I'm sorry, but what's the causal relationship there?

LABEL: 0x258A
STRING: My father and me. That has nothing to do with this.」

LABEL: 0x25D5
STRING: Even if I exhausted all my words to express myself, my logic was powerless against those who refused to listen.

LABEL: 0x263E
STRING: As time flowed, the number of people who would speak to me was inversely proportional.

LABEL: 0x2675
STRING: In the closed space beneath ROMLES, the flow of time accelerated, eventually reaching a steady state.

LABEL: 0x26D3
STRING: 「And as for me――」

LABEL: 0x26FC
STRING: Before I knew it, I was alone.

LABEL: 0x2721
STRING: When I closed my eyes, I could see Rumi-chan.

LABEL: 0x274B
STRING: If she had aspired to be a scientist like me, would she have ended up like this?

LABEL: 0x27B3
STRING: Meaningless questions only lead to meaningless answers.

LABEL: 0x27F2
STRING: A clean ceiling and an empty space.

LABEL: 0x2828
STRING: What I had to do was excessively clear.

LABEL: 0x2931
STRING: The memories flowing through my mind gently caressed my cheeks like a spring breeze.

LABEL: 0x2979
STRING: We no longer had the means to stop walking toward the raging storm that awaited us.

LABEL: 0x2AA3
STRING: That day, I was in the middle of an experiment, just like every other day.

LABEL: 0x2AF1
STRING: The task of piling up records of events that have been parameterized over homogeneous and empty time.

LABEL: 0x2B43
STRING: It was just like finding a statue within a large block of stone.

LABEL: 0x2B87
STRING: A simple task that would continue straight until the end of the observation―or, so it should have been.

LABEL: 0x2BE4
STRING: Suddenly, the lights went out.

LABEL: 0x2C07
STRING: 「A blackout...?」

LABEL: 0x2C24
STRING: My vision darkened. Even though it was still only evening, it was spectacularly dark.

LABEL: 0x2C6E
STRING: I was reminded that this was the Underdark, whether I liked it or not.

LABEL: 0x2CB6
STRING: It was pitch black. I couldn't see even a millimeter ahead.

LABEL: 0x2CE0
STRING: That being the case, I decided to connect the images of him and her together with my eyes open.

LABEL: 0x2D3D
STRING: Rumi-chan and father.

LABEL: 0x2D63
STRING: The scenery of that day and our nostalgic house rose up before my eyes.

LABEL: 0x2DAE
STRING: ――Ah, I was finally home.

LABEL: 0x2DDE
STRING: 「Rumi-chan, how have you been?」

LABEL: 0x2E0D
STRING: 「It's been a while, Onee-chan!」

LABEL: 0x2E40
STRING: Her sparkling eyes hadn't changed. She welcomed me in the same way as always.

LABEL: 0x2EA8
STRING: I spread my arms wide to catch my sister as she tried to hug me――

LABEL: 0x2EEA
STRING: The emergency lights turned on, and a hazy laboratory appeared before me.

LABEL: 0x2F31
STRING: The nostalgic house vanished.

LABEL: 0x2F5A

LABEL: 0x2FBD
STRING: Where were they going? The experiment was still in progress.

LABEL: 0x2FFA
STRING: It might be a little dark, but that didn't mean that we couldn't continue our work, did it?

LABEL: 0x3056
STRING: 「Honestly... At a time like this.」

LABEL: 0x3087
STRING: 「Hmm, hmm, mm-hmm, hmm, hmm.」

LABEL: 0x30CA
STRING: While humming in an eleven-beat, I took out two chemicals.

LABEL: 0x3109
STRING: I quickly mixed the luminol solution and peroxide together, and―――

LABEL: 0x3164
STRING: A dim light emerged.

LABEL: 0x319E
STRING: 「Science is science only when it's useful.」

STRING: The light was reminiscent of bioluminescence.

LABEL: 0x31F8
STRING: It was hard to believe that it was just liquid, shimmering and shifting.

LABEL: 0x324B
STRING: ――The mystery of life.

LABEL: 0x326A
STRING: The gentle colors soothed me slowly.

LABEL: 0x32A1
STRING: A peaceful rest was already far away, however.

LABEL: 0x32D3
STRING: The world was waiting for me――

LABEL: 0x3308
STRING: 「Oops, I was in the middle of a titration.

LABEL: 0x3330
STRING: ...But we're already past the equivalent point!」

LABEL: 0x3373
STRING: ...Well...

STRING: Just being able to see this light was a good thing.

STRING: The luminol reaction quietly converged.

LABEL: 0x33F9
STRING: I reached for the experiment equipment once again.

LABEL: 0x350D
STRING: 「...Have you been well?」

LABEL: 0x352E
STRING: 「Long time no see, Father.」

LABEL: 0x3555
STRING: 「Really... It's been a surprisingly long time.

LABEL: 0x35A1
STRING: How are you doing lately?」

LABEL: 0x35CA
STRING: 「For some reason, people aren't in the experiment facilities, so it's a lot easier to use Spacium.」

LABEL: 0x3610
STRING: A short while after that incident, my father arrived at the laboratory.

LABEL: 0x3657
STRING: He still had the same youthful appearance, but he seemed to have lost some weight in the short time we had been apart.

LABEL: 0x36BE
STRING: Time continued to pass――

LABEL: 0x36E4
STRING: Once again, I engraved the truth of this world into the notebook of my heart.

LABEL: 0x3720
STRING: 「Do you not follow the news?」

LABEL: 0x374F
STRING: 「Sorry. I don't have anything like that here.」

LABEL: 0x378A
STRING: ROMLES had a strict information management policy that required all electronic devices to be confiscated.

LABEL: 0x37EB
STRING: The equipment used in the research was provided separately, and the news was learned through three periodic reports a day, but...

LABEL: 0x3852
STRING: Now that I thought about it, there hadn't been any since that day.

LABEL: 0x38B6
STRING: 「Honestly, being stoic like that... By the looks of it, you haven't gone outside, either.

LABEL: 0x391E
STRING: While it's a virtue to focus on one thing, you'd better do something about that reclusive nature of yours.」

LABEL: 0x3985
STRING: 「With all due respect, going out alone isn't much fun, is it?」

LABEL: 0x39D6
STRING: 「You always went off on your own whenever we went out, didn't you?」

LABEL: 0x3A31
STRING: 「That's because I wasn't alone. Because of that, I was able to be alone.」

LABEL: 0x3A94
STRING: 「I see. I understand.」

LABEL: 0x3AC2
STRING: Father smiled and patted my head.

LABEL: 0x3B03
STRING: He was willing to listen to what I had to say... Ah, he really was a good person.

LABEL: 0x3B56
STRING: Before long, the palm he stroked my head with turned into a melodic sign, and two of his fingers were pressed against my forehead.

LABEL: 0x3BC3
STRING: 「That stings, Father.」

LABEL: 0x3BEA
STRING: 「That's true. It really stings. You're so cute, Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x3C2D
STRING: At times like this, I lost track of my father's intentions,

LABEL: 0x3C75
STRING: but I also felt that even if I were to understand them, there would be nothing to gain.

LABEL: 0x3D61
STRING: 「By the way... I have an important mission for you.」

LABEL: 0x3D92
STRING: Father spoke.

LABEL: 0x3DBF
STRING: It was an unreasonable demand――

LABEL: 0x3DDD
STRING: Isolating an area of the sea without harming the creatures inside.

LABEL: 0x3E1E
STRING: 「Have you heard about it?」

LABEL: 0x3E4B
STRING: 「You've never heard of it, have you?

LABEL: 0x3E6E
STRING: That's why you're going to succeed.」

LABEL: 0x3E9B
STRING: Saying that, he smiled again.

LABEL: 0x3ED7
STRING: 「You're kind, so I know you can do it.」

LABEL: 0x3F02
STRING: 「Yes, Father...

LABEL: 0x3F1E
STRING: All living things are equally valuable. There's no such thing as a wasted life.

LABEL: 0x3F6C
STRING: ...I'm sure this research will be worthwhile.」

LABEL: 0x3FAE
STRING: 「I'm counting on you, Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x3FCB
STRING: I know I haven't been acting the part of a%Nfather, but... I've been busy with organizational work lately.」

LABEL: 0x4028
STRING: 「You look the part of a great old man.」

LABEL: 0x4055
STRING: I never thought the day would come when the word "tired" would describe my Father.

LABEL: 0x4099
STRING: "Now then," he said over his back as he stood up.

LABEL: 0x40D6
STRING: 「Oh, right――

LABEL: 0x40F1
STRING: Rumi wanted to see you. I'll bring her along next time.」

LABEL: 0x42DF
STRING: My Father was not the type to break his promises.

LABEL: 0x431E
STRING: Promises to others, to himself, and of course, to his daughters.

LABEL: 0x4373
STRING: While counting the days to the day Rumi-chan would come to visit,

LABEL: 0x43AD
STRING: she arrived on the exact day as promised.

LABEL: 0x43F9
STRING: 「Onee-chan! It's Rumi! Do you remember me?!」

STRING: 「A half-timbered path is something I should forget. More importantly, how have you been, Rumi-chan?」

STRING: 「I'm reading a book.」

LABEL: 0x44B8
STRING: Wonderful!

LABEL: 0x44CD
STRING: Wonderful!

LABEL: 0x44E4
STRING: Wonderful!

LABEL: 0x44FE
STRING: She was my dear sister, after all, saying that she was reading a book when asked how she was doing.

LABEL: 0x4560
STRING: Rumi-chan walked up to me and pressed the page of the book in her hands against my nose.

LABEL: 0x45C9
STRING: 「Onee-chan, how do you read this?」

LABEL: 0x4600
STRING: 「It's read as "inside the room."」

LABEL: 0x463B

STRING: As if to imprint them in her brain――

LABEL: 0x46B4
STRING: ――Ma・Ku・No・U・Chi

STRING: 「Rumi-chan, what book is that?」

LABEL: 0x4711
STRING: 「Ah, it's a book about mermaids.」

LABEL: 0x4736
STRING: Come to think of it, Andersen was her favorite, wasn't he?

LABEL: 0x477F
STRING: ...The cover looked very Japanese for Andersen.

LABEL: 0x47C2
STRING: Looking down at the book and raising her gaze, she repeated that motion until she eventually asked a question.

LABEL: 0x4818
STRING: 「Do you think that mermaids exist, Onee-chan?」

STRING: 「Mermaids, huh? From an evolutionary standpoint, that's a tough one.

STRING: 「Is that so...」

STRING: 「Ah.」

STRING: Now I've done it.

STRING: Hawawawawa, not good, not good.

LABEL: 0x4AD5

LABEL: 0x4B8F
STRING: 「...What is it...? A world without mermaids... Onee-chan...」

STRING: I made a light-hearted appeal in the face of Rumi-chan's voice, which was shrouded in a white haze.

STRING: 「Whales are amazing! They're as smart as humans!

STRING: ...But we're already past the equivalent point!

STRING: 「Hwoeh?!」

STRING: I thrust my finger into Rumi-chan's wide-open mouth without hesitation.

STRING: 「Amazing! Onee-chan, you're amazing!」

STRING: 「Rumi-chan, as thanks, I'll take you somewhere next time.

STRING: I'll take your request now, okay?」

STRING: 「Hmm...

STRING: I want to see the stars.」

STRING: 「The stars?」

LABEL: 0x4FA6
STRING: Hearing her unexpected answer, she nodded her head like a demon.

STRING: The name I gave her―the chameleon of the jazz world...

LABEL: 0x50B5
STRING: No, Lumiere=Hikari.

LABEL: 0x50E2
STRING: The principle of light that guided us all was none other than the starry sky above us...

LABEL: 0x511F
STRING: 「Okay, I understand. Then that's where we'll go.」

LABEL: 0x514C
STRING: 「Really?!」

LABEL: 0x516D
STRING: 「Of course.」

LABEL: 0x5188
STRING: I'd made a decision. I would show Rumi-chan that truly wonderful view.

LABEL: 0x52FC
STRING: And so, the promised night arrived.

LABEL: 0x532F
STRING: The sky was clear. Perfect weather for stargazing.

LABEL: 0x5362
STRING: To Rumi-chan, who had come to the facility by herself, I said thus:

LABEL: 0x53AF
STRING: 「Let's go to the sea.」

LABEL: 0x53D4
STRING: Without knowing what consequences it would lead to, I reached out my hand and――

LABEL: 0x54D8
STRING: ――Kurama Bay.

LABEL: 0x54F3
STRING: We arrived at the pitch-black sea in the middle of the night.

LABEL: 0x5520
STRING: Cold waves came and went in a never-ending flow.

LABEL: 0x5563
STRING: Their gentle rhythm was the breath of the earth.

LABEL: 0x558E
STRING: Its sound purified us all――

LABEL: 0x55D6
STRING: 「Wooooow!」

LABEL: 0x55F9
STRING: That was Rumi-chan shouting while looking up at the sky.

LABEL: 0x5630
STRING: 「Deneb! That's Deneb over there!」

LABEL: 0x565F
STRING: 「I know. By the way, I don't really care about Altair and Vega.」

LABEL: 0x56AC
STRING: 「Why not?!」

LABEL: 0x56CD
STRING: 「Because real life is full of it.」

LABEL: 0x56FB
STRING: A lover you could only meet once a year――

LABEL: 0x5723
STRING: But, for a being as large as the stars in the heavens,

LABEL: 0x5763
STRING: I was sure a year's worth of time would pass in the blink of an eye.

LABEL: 0x57AA
STRING: 「Let me tell you a nice story, Rumi-chan.」

LABEL: 0x57EB
STRING: 「Cygnus Deneb...

LABEL: 0x580F
STRING: There's an exoplanet called Kepler-452 1400 light years away in that direction.

LABEL: 0x585E
STRING: Its diameter is 1.6 times that of the Earth, and it exists in a『habitable』zone, and――」

LABEL: 0x58AA
STRING: 「In a『bathtub...?』」

LABEL: 0x58CB
STRING: 「To put it simply, Kepler-452 is a candidate for a "second Earth."」

LABEL: 0x5916
STRING: 「In other words, there might be life on that planet.

LABEL: 0x595A
STRING: And, maybe they're looking at us the same way we're looking at them.」

LABEL: 0x59A3
STRING: 「It's so exciting to think that there's life that far away in space!」

LABEL: 0x59EA
STRING: Saying that, Rumi-chan reached out her hand.

LABEL: 0x5A1B
STRING: Even though she was jumping up and down energetically with her petite body, the feeling that she was getting closer to the sky was nonexistent.

LABEL: 0x5A72
STRING: Reaching out to something because you couldn't reach it might be meaningful in and of itself.

LABEL: 0x5ACA
STRING: 「That's right. Everyone admires the night sky. They dream of the unknown life beyond it.

LABEL: 0x5B26
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x5B37
STRING: if it's life you're looking for, you'd be surprised how much of it there is on this planet.

LABEL: 0x5B7D
STRING: Outer space may be romantic, but even in this sea...」

LABEL: 0x5BB8
STRING: I picked up a stone beside me...

LABEL: 0x5BDD
STRING: 「――There's nothing but the unknown.」

LABEL: 0x5C0C
STRING: I threw the stone into the dark sea.

LABEL: 0x5C57
STRING: It happened so fast.

LABEL: 0x5C8A
STRING: A light, isolated in the jet-black sea.

LABEL: 0x5CB3
STRING: The faint blue light flickered and gradually spread out, extending to the boundary of the Dead Sea like a wave...

LABEL: 0x5D14
STRING: It was similar to a luminol reaction inside a petri dish, only much more beautiful――

LABEL: 0x5D6C
STRING: ――The mystery of life.

LABEL: 0x5D8D
STRING: 「Sea fireflies.」

LABEL: 0x5DAD
STRING: I called out to Rumi-chan, who was speechless with admiration.

LABEL: 0x5DEA
STRING: 「These are sea fireflies?!」

LABEL: 0x5E11
STRING: 「Sea fireflies!」

LABEL: 0x5E34
STRING: 「They're sea fireflies, right?!」

LABEL: 0x5E5B
STRING: 「They're sea fireflies!」

LABEL: 0x5E80
STRING: 「Sea――」

LABEL: 0x5E9B
STRING: Let's stop.

LABEL: 0x5EB5
STRING: Rumi-chan laughed quietly under the stars.

LABEL: 0x5EEB
STRING: 「Surrounded by the stars of the sea and the sky like this, it's like I'm a stage dancer.」

LABEL: 0x5F3E
STRING: 「Really? That's so... so...!」

LABEL: 0x5F77
STRING: She looked truly adorable with her joyful expression and rosy cheeks,

LABEL: 0x5FBD
STRING: and her beautiful face, which she had inherited from me, was shining brightly.

LABEL: 0x6002
STRING: 「By the way, sea fireflies are not actual fireflies.

LABEL: 0x603A
STRING: They're the vargula genus of the cyprihinidae family of the myodocopia order of the ostracoda class.」

LABEL: 0x6091
STRING: 「I hon't ged id...」

LABEL: 0x60B6
STRING: She was nibbling on my finger, which I had unconsciously stuck into her mouth.

LABEL: 0x60FA
STRING: Rumi-chan was entranced by the sea, unable to avert her eyes from it.

LABEL: 0x613E
STRING: 「Hey, Rumi-chan...」

LABEL: 0x6165
STRING: 「Hwad?」

LABEL: 0x617E
STRING: 「Look.

LABEL: 0x619A
STRING: You don't have to look up to the skies――

LABEL: 0x61B9
STRING: There's so much light right%Nhere.」

LABEL: 0x61E4
STRING: She said she had wanted to see the stars, and here there were both the stars in the heavens above and the glimmering lights of the sea.

LABEL: 0x6235
STRING: I was sure this scene was a perfect one for her.

LABEL: 0x6272
STRING: A guiding light――

LABEL: 0x628C
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x62A5
STRING: The Three Sacred Treasures, the three primary colors, the thunderbird, and the Sun Vulcan.

LABEL: 0x62C8
STRING: Starlight and sea fireflies.

LABEL: 0x62ED
STRING: According to my calculations, there was one more thing.

LABEL: 0x631E
STRING: 「Rumi-chan, look.」

LABEL: 0x634F
STRING: Across the sea, the sky in the direction I was pointing at was gradually lighting up――

LABEL: 0x638F
STRING: 「Waaaahh――――」

LABEL: 0x63B2
STRING: Rumi-chan dashes off in the direction of the sunrise.

LABEL: 0x63E8
STRING: The whitening sky, an entryway to a new morning... She was trying to rush in before anyone else.

LABEL: 0x642F
STRING: 「Be careful―」

LABEL: 0x6450
STRING: 「I'll be fine!」

LABEL: 0x6475
STRING: After watching her go, I looked up at the stars.

LABEL: 0x64B9
STRING: Although the gentle rhythm of the stars in the heavens

LABEL: 0x64F9
STRING: and the ebb and flow of the tides weren't something meant for us,

LABEL: 0x652D
STRING: we still believed that we were being watched over by them.

LABEL: 0x657A
STRING: We could only hope that the stars yearned for us as much as we yearned for them,

LABEL: 0x65C8
STRING: even if we could never know for certain.

LABEL: 0x6607
STRING: After all, there was nothing that could stop us from thinking about them.

LABEL: 0x6645
STRING: After a while, I returned my gaze to the morning sun.

LABEL: 0x667C
STRING: Rumi-chan had been running beyond the white that drove away the dark of night.

LABEL: 0x66CD
STRING: I turned around, lowered my gaze, and looked around.

LABEL: 0x670A
STRING: To the sea, to the mountains...

LABEL: 0x672D
STRING: And then, to the side of the stars in the heavens... However...

LABEL: 0x675B
STRING: I finally caught Rumi-chan's figure on the beach.

LABEL: 0x679E
STRING: 「Rumi...chan?」

LABEL: 0x67C3
STRING: Dizzines struck me, bathed in the morning sunlight.

LABEL: 0x67FE
STRING: And when I looked up again, she was still there in the distance,

LABEL: 0x683B
STRING: collapsed and not moving.

LABEL: 0x6863
STRING: 「Rumi-chan!」

LABEL: 0x6886
STRING: I wasn't sure if I screamed or not.

LABEL: 0x68D0
STRING: I ran,

LABEL: 0x68E4
STRING: fell over,

LABEL: 0x68F8
STRING: scraped my hands and knees and started running again.

LABEL: 0x692A
STRING: I ran,

LABEL: 0x693E
STRING: swinging my arms,

LABEL: 0x6954
STRING: falling over,

LABEL: 0x6968
STRING: standing up,

LABEL: 0x6982
STRING: breaking into a run,

LABEL: 0x699A
STRING: approaching her.

LABEL: 0x69B0
STRING: ――Rumi-chan was bleeding from her arm.

LABEL: 0x69EA
STRING: I brushed off the sand on my hands and grabbed her injured arm.

LABEL: 0x6A33
STRING: A painful scar remained on her slender, white, and supple arm.

LABEL: 0x6A6C
STRING: After wiping off the blood with a clean cloth, I could see that it was a deep bite wound.

LABEL: 0x6AAF
STRING: What... kind of creature did this?

LABEL: 0x6AFC
STRING: Rumi's face contorted.

LABEL: 0x6B21
STRING: 「Are you okay, Rumi-chan?!

LABEL: 0x6B4A
STRING: What bit you?!」

LABEL: 0x6B75
STRING: 「――A mermaid.」

LABEL: 0x6B90
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x6BA7
STRING: I wrapped her arm around my shoulder and tried to stand up, but I staggered.

LABEL: 0x6C0B
STRING: There was no strength in her body at all.

LABEL: 0x6C43
STRING: When I looked, her face seemed to be in a daze, too――

LABEL: 0x6C7F
STRING: 「Hey, Onee-chan...

LABEL: 0x6C9E
STRING: I knew it...」

LABEL: 0x6CBB
STRING: While breathing heavily, she stared at the border between the sky and the sea with unfocused eyes.

LABEL: 0x6D14
STRING: 「...Mermaids hold a grudge against humans after all, don't they?」

LABEL: 0x6D5D
STRING: ――Ah.

LABEL: 0x6D73
STRING: Was it the mermaid book she was reading?

LABEL: 0x6DB9
STRING: Come to think of it, the ending of that fairy tale...

LABEL: 0x6DE7
STRING: 「That's not true.

LABEL: 0x6E0D
STRING: Didn't the mermaid say that humans were the kindest creatures in this world?!」

LABEL: 0x6E70
STRING: I pulled the line from my memory.

LABEL: 0x6E97
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x6EB2
STRING: Smiling weakly, Rumi-chan quietly closed her eyes.

LABEL: 0x6EEF
STRING: It was as if she had fallen into a peaceful sleep.

LABEL: 0x6F35
STRING: However, the scar on her arm was still oddly dark――

LABEL: 0x6F75
STRING: 「Rumi-chan, wait for me here.

LABEL: 0x6F9E
STRING: I'll go and get a doctor right away.」

LABEL: 0x6FD5
STRING: Onee-chan had to save her.

LABEL: 0x7008
STRING: Leaving her on the beach, I ran off――

LABEL: 0x703C
STRING: ――But, where to?

LABEL: 0x705E
STRING: What hospital was open this early in the morning?

LABEL: 0x708D
STRING: I walked as fast as I could and ran out of breath.

LABEL: 0x70C6
STRING: On the way, I fell down again.

LABEL: 0x70ED
STRING: But I didn't have time to stand still.

LABEL: 0x712A
STRING: There was no way to know, but...

LABEL: 0x715F
STRING: Because I took her out here, Rumi-chan was――

LABEL: 0x719B
STRING: And so...

LABEL: 0x71B1
STRING: I made my way back to ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x71E8
STRING: I pounded on the door of the facility with all my might.

LABEL: 0x7221
STRING: 「It's me! It's Saihouji Tokiwa!」

LABEL: 0x7256
STRING: I slammed on the door,

LABEL: 0x726E
STRING: hit it,

LABEL: 0x7282
STRING: I hit it, but...

LABEL: 0x72A9
STRING: No one came out.

LABEL: 0x72F2
STRING: Why wouldn't it open?

LABEL: 0x731F
STRING: If it wouldn't open, there was no point in staying here.

LABEL: 0x7368
STRING: It was... already...

LABEL: 0x7389
STRING: I started walking again―and fell over in an instant.

LABEL: 0x73CC
STRING: Wasn't it strange to fall over this much when there was nothing there――

LABEL: 0x7412
STRING: ――Yes, it was strange.

LABEL: 0x743F
STRING: As I stood up and staggered to my feet, I finally realized something.

LABEL: 0x749C
STRING: The abnormality in my own body.

LABEL: 0x74C1
STRING: But, it was already too late.

LABEL: 0x74FE
STRING: And so, I... Saihouji Tokiwa...

LABEL: 0x753D
STRING: ...Fell into a deep slumber.

LABEL: 0x756F
STRING: ――Two days later.

LABEL: 0x7592
STRING: The sky changed without warning and turned into one of the heaviest storms in recent years.

LABEL: 0x75DF
STRING: I wouldn't know the consequences of it until much, much later... Seven years into the future.
